SKT_FIRST.name: Shatter!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. If Sterope had a buff before attacking, activates an additional attack on the same target and grants <color=#28d9ed>Divine Retribution</color>.\n\n<color=#28d9ed>Divine Retribution</color>: Increases damage dealt by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>4%</color>. (Max 15 stacks)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃前から【ステロペ】に強化効果がある場合、対象に追加攻撃が発生し、<color=#28d9ed>【神鳴り】</color>を獲得する。\n\n<color=#28d9ed>【神鳴り】</color>:この効果を獲得するたびに、味方全体の与えるダメージを<color=#28d9ed>4%</color>UPさせる。この効果は最大15回まで累積する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 공격 전 스테로페가 강화 효과를 보유하고 있었다면 동일한 대상에게 추가 공격을 발생시키고, <color=#28d9ed>신의 천벌</color>을 획득합니다.\n\n<color=#28d9ed>신의 천벌</color> : 아군 전체의 피해를 <color=#28d9ed>4%</color> 증가시킵니다. (최대 15회 누적)
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。攻击前,若史提洛佩附带强化效果,则对相同目标发动额外攻击,并获得<color=#28d9ed>降下神罚!</color>效果。\n\n<color=#28d9ed>降下神罚!</color>:使全体友军伤害提升<color=#28d9ed>4%</color>。(最多可叠加15次)

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +1 WG damage with additional attacks\nIncreases damage
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 追加攻撃のWGダメージ +1\nダメージUP
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 额外攻击的WG伤害量+1\n伤害提升

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\n5 Stacks of Divine Retribution
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【神鳴り】5回累積
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n降下神罚叠加5次

SKT_SECOND.name: Begin the Crusade
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)戦闘開始時、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 전투 시작 후 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (被动效果)战斗开始后,对全体敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>无法恢复</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。

2_jp: 敵の強化効果ターン-1ターン
2_zh: 敌人强化效果持续时间-1回合
3_jp: 味方が反撃で受けるダメージ-10%
3_kr: 반격 피격 시 팀 받는 피해  -10%
3_zh: 受到反击时队伍所受伤害-10%
4_jp: 味方が反撃で受けるダメージ-10%
4_kr: 반격 피격 시 팀 받는 피해  -10%
4_zh: 受到反击时队伍所受伤害-10%
5_jp: 味方が反撃で受けるダメージ-10%
5_kr: 반격 피격 시 팀 받는 피해  -10%
5_zh: 受到反击时队伍所受伤害-10%

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Fight Ferociously!
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: イージス・サンクチュアリ
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の命中と効果命中を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせた後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2のターン</color>間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>명중</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>효과 적중</color>을 증가시키고, <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>和<color=#28d9ed>效果命中</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,并对全体敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>无法恢复</color>效果,持续\n<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: -1 turn skill cooldowns on allies except caster
2_jp: 自分を除く味方全体のスキルターン-1ターン
2_zh: 除自身外的全体友军冷却时间-1回合
5: -1 turn skill cooldowns on allies except caster
5_jp: 自分を除く味方全体のスキルターン-1ターン
5_zh: 除自身外的全体友军冷却时间-1回合

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces the skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分の最大<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>が高いほど、与えるダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 아군 전체의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>이 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:攻击后,使全体友军的技能冷却时间减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:自身的<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>越高,则伤害量越高。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
